import pandas as pd 
import h2o
from h2o.automl import H2OAutoML
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

source.de6a6ebe:
plt.figure(figsize=(14 , 14))
corr = train_pd.corr()
mask = np.zeros_like(corr, dtype=np.bool)
mask[np.triu_indices_from(mask)] = True
sns.heatmap(corr, square=True, mask = mask, cmap='coolwarm_r', annot_kws={'size':20})
source.60aae1ba:
#histogram of numeric values.
num_col= train_pd.columns #[col for col in train_pd.columns if (col not in cat_var) ]
plt.figure(figsize=(100, 100))
i=1
for col in num_col:
    plt.subplot(12,10,i)
    sns.histplot(data=train_pd, x=col)
    plt.title(col+" distribution")
    i=i+1
plt.show()
